venue.name: Starts at Makusue Ski House in N Conway NH

item.description:
North Conway NH
There is something for everyone this weekend. There will be a hike,
paddle around Conway lake, Motorcycle ride, bonfire and cook out.
Possibly a pub crawl for others.

https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=120393604715906

http://www.meetup.com/Makusue-Ski-and-Sport-Club/#upcoming

Also if not attending, there is a way that you can donate to the HFOT
charity online. When you do, please make sure that you do so under the
Makusue event. Here is the link

http://www.homesforourtroops.org/site/Calendar/1374858978?view=Detail&id=108201

group.name: Boston Ski, Snowboard, and Outdoor Adventurers Meetup Group

item.name: Homes for our troops charity fund raiser. adventure weekend N Conway NH
